faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Check out our Frequently Asked Questions

item_1.question: Are external libraries required by {{ProdShortName}} for document manipulation?
item_1.answer: {{ProdShortName}} works independently, no need for third-party software like Adobe Acrobat, Microsoft Office, etc.

item_2.question: Can I test {{ProdShortName}} features before buying?
item_2.answer: Yes, {{ProdShortName}} offers a free trial! Install it and try it out, but keep in mind: Trial versions add 'trial badges' to your documents, only the first 3 pages are processed. Want the full experience? Get a free 30-day temporary license for full functionality. See details under [temporary license]({{LicensingUrl}}).

item_3.question: What license types are provided?
item_3.answer: Need a {{ProdShortName}} license? We've got options! Choose from licenses based on many options. Number of developers in your team. Deployment locations like single office or remote workplaces. Does end-customer distribution need to share the SDK/API with clients? Alternatively, there's a license for monthly usage: Pay only for what you use with metered plans. Dive deeper and find the perfect [price]({{PricingUrl}}).

cloud_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} low code APIs
cloud_links.description: Add watermarks to files by your application using our cloud-based REST API.

item_1.content: Use cURL RESTful API to watermark PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, JPEG and other popular file formats.

item_2.content: Empower your .NET applications with documents watermarking features by Cloud SDK for .NET. Protect business documents on your own.

item_3.content: {{ProdShortName}} SDK designed for Java grants new possibilities for your Java applications and business files.

app_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} Web apps
app_links.description: GroupDocs grants access to web application for adding watermarks to your documents. More than 50 popular file formats could be watermarked in your favorite browser FOR FREE.

item_1.content: On-line tool to add watermarks to documents from any device.

index-content-net.head_title: C# .NET Document Watermark Software | add watermark library | remove watermark software | watermark office documents
index-content-net.head_description: C# .NET Library to add, search and remove image & text-based watermarks to documents: PDF, Word, Excel, presentations, Visio diagrams, email and image file formats.
index-content-net.title: Watermark documents easily in your C# .NET applications
index-content-net.description: Empower your C# solutions with a flexible document watermarking API that provides adding customizable watermarks to all popular document formats.
index-content-net.overview_description: API to put watermarks on documents via .NET

overview_feature_1.title: C# files watermark
overview_feature_1.description: Add watermarks to your business files using {{ProdShortName}}. Use text, images, diagrams or email attachments.

overview_feature_2.title: Customize watermarks to your goals
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdFullName}} software allows to customize watermarks in various ways. Text styles like bold, italic, font types along with image properties like rotation etc. enrich watermarking process.

overview_feature_3.title: All popular file formats are supported
overview_feature_3.description: Many file and document formats are supported by {{ProdShortName}} solution. PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images like JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, Visio diagrams, emails etc. could be protected with our watermarks.

overview_feature_4.title: Search and update watermarks
overview_feature_4.description: Watermarks which are already presented in a document may be found and processed again. Modify text, style, images or remove revealed watermarks without extra efforts.

features.title: {{ProdShortName}} features
features.description: Protect PDF, Office, Images and other formats by watermark

feature_1.title: Documents watermarking
feature_1.content: Add or Remove Watermarks from a Particular Section or whole Document of Various File Formats.

feature_2.title: Style your watermark
feature_2.content: Customize various watermark properties like color, font, rotation etc.

feature_3.title: PDF hidden printing watermark
feature_3.content: Allocate Hidden Watermark to PDF that only Appears when Printing Document.

feature_4.title: Watermark only images in documents
feature_4.content: Watermark all Images in a Particular Section, Page, Slide, or Document.

feature_5.title: Process selected image frames
feature_5.content: Assign Watermark to only Particular Frames of a Multi-Framed Image.

feature_6.title: Attachments & shapes
feature_6.content: Set Watermark to all Attachments in an Excel Document & all Image Shapes in Slides.

feature_7.title: PDF objects
feature_7.content: Align Watermark to Bleed Box, Art Box, Crop Box, or Trim Box in PDF Document.

feature_8.title: Documents background
feature_8.content: Place Watermark or Remove it from the Background Images of Spreadsheet or Slides.

feature_9.title: Unreadable Characters Protection
feature_9.content: Protect Text Watermark using Unreadable Characters in Presentations.

feature_10.title: Search Watermarks in Documents
feature_10.content: Search Watermarks Based on Specific Parameters or by Combining Multiple Criteria.

feature_11.title: Search similar image watermarks
feature_11.content: Look for Image Watermarks that Resemble a Particular Image.

feature_12.title: Get document information
feature_12.content: Programmatically Extract Page Setup & Other Information for Supported Formats.

index-content-java.head_title: Java Watermark Library | add watermarks to documents | remove watermark popular file formats | watermark office documents
index-content-java.head_description: Native Java Software to add and manipulate text and image watermarks in PDF, Word, Excel, Presentations, Visio diagrams, email and images files.
index-content-java.title: Implement documents watermarking in Java projects easily
index-content-java.description: Enhance your Java applications with the ability to watermark files using the GroupDocs.Watermark library. Our API offers customizable watermarks for a wide range of popular file formats.
index-content-java.overview_description: Library designed for adding watermarks using Java technologies

overview_feature_1.title: Files watermarking in Java
overview_feature_1.description: Detect changes between source and target files at paragraph, word, and character levels. Identify styling and formatting changes such as bold, italic, underlines, strike-throughs, font types, and more.

overview_feature_2.title: Vast number of supported formats
overview_feature_2.description: With the GroupDocs.Comparison API, you can easily compare documents of multiple supported formats. This includes PDF, HTML, email, Microsoft Office Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, OneNote, Visio diagrams, texts, JPEG, PNG, GIF, and BMP images, as well as many other formats.

overview_feature_3.title: Apply or reject changes easily
overview_feature_3.description: Every difference between the compared documents can be applied or rejected and then exported to the output document.

overview_feature_4.title: Comparison summary report
overview_feature_4.description: Generate a summary report that lists all changes in the compared documents.

features.title: GroupDocs.Comparison features
features.description: Easily compare PDF and Office documents, images and other formats

feature_1.title: Easy to use document comparison
feature_1.content: Easily analyze and pinpoint differences between two documents.

feature_2.title: Compare multiple documents
feature_2.content: Simultaneously examine and highlight variances across multiple documents.

feature_3.title: Supported formats
feature_3.content: Compatibility with over 50 widely-used document formats from diverse categories.

feature_4.title: Accept or reject changes
feature_4.content: Clear visualization of identified changes, with options to accept or reject modifications.

feature_5.title: Generate previews
feature_5.content: Capability to save comparison results as image previews.

feature_6.title: Content comparison
feature_6.content: Thorough comparison of text content on various levels - including line-by-line, paragraph, word, and character analysis, with emphasis on alterations.

feature_7.title: Style comparison
feature_7.content: Ability to detect and highlight alterations in formatting and style elements.

feature_8.title: Set metadata
feature_8.content: Option to retain metadata from source or target files, or permit user-defined metadata settings.

feature_9.title: Password protection
feature_9.content: Facilitates analysis of password-protected documents and enables password protection for the resultant documents.

feature_10.title: Compare specific pages
feature_10.content: Load and compare specific sections or pages of a document as required.

feature_11.title: Display comments
feature_11.content: Flexibility to display or conceal comments when loading the source document.

index-content-java.platforms_description: GroupDocs.Comparison for Java supports the following operating systems, frameworks and package managers
index-content-java.formats_description: GroupDocs.Comparison for Java supports operations with the following [file formats]({{SupportedFormatsUrl}}).
index-content-java.code_samples_description: Some use cases of typical GroupDocs.Comparison for Java operations
index-content-java.code_samples_sample_1_content: To compare documents that are [protected with a password]({{Sample1Url}}), you need to specify it then loading the documents:
index-content-java.code_samples_sample_2_content: GroupDocs.Comparison allows you to [compare more than two documents]({{Sample2Url}}). The operation is almost the same as when comparing two files. You just need to add more target files to the `comparer` class.

index-content-nodejs-java.head_title: Node.js Watermarking Library | add watermarks to files | remove watermark | watermark files
index-content-nodejs-java.head_description: Node.js-based solution allows users to protect business documents by adding text and image watermarks. Many popular formats like PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint are supported.
index-content-nodejs-java.title: Access to watermarking technology in Node.js via Java solutions
index-content-nodejs-java.description: Protect your intellectual property and prevent unauthorized copying with this Node.js solution. It allows users to easily add watermarks to business documents in various formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images etc.
index-content-nodejs-java.actions_main: Use NPM to download for free
index-content-nodejs-java.code_title: Add watermark to PDF with TypeScript

overview_feature_1.title: Documents protection with watermarks
overview_feature_1.description: GroupDocs.Comparison identifies changes in document content (characters, words, paragraphs, tables, charts), as well as, changes in document style. It provides customers with a resulting report that contains rich information about differences, their number, and type.

overview_feature_2.title: Most popular file and document formats are supported
overview_feature_2.description: With GroupDocs.Comparison API you can efficiently compare documents of any supported formats like PDF, HTML, e-mail, Microsoft Office Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, OneNote, Visio diagrams, texts, JPEG, PNG, GIF, and BMP images as well as many other formats.

overview_feature_3.title: Documentation and examples
overview_feature_3.description: There is already a lot of documentation on using Comparison library on different platforms with code examples, so you donâ€™t have to think hard about how to work with GroupDocs.Comparison API in your Node.js application.

overview_feature_4.title: Comparison summary report
overview_feature_4.description: Generate a summary report that lists all changes in the compared documents.

features.title: GroupDocs.Comparison for Node.js features
features.description: Easily compare PDF and Office documents, images and other formats

feature_1.title: Easy to use document comparison
feature_1.content: Analyze and identify differences within two documents.

feature_2.title: Compare multiple documents
feature_2.content: Analyze and identify differences within multiple documents simultaneously.

feature_3.title: Supported formats
feature_3.content: Supports more than 50 popular document formats from various categories.

feature_4.title: Accept or reject changes
feature_4.content: Clear visual representation of identified changes, providing the option to accept or reject modifications.

feature_5.title: Generate previews
feature_5.content: Save the results of the comparison as images.

feature_6.title: Content comparison
feature_6.content: Compare text content line-by-line, by paragraphs, by words, by characters. Highlight the changes.

feature_7.title: Style comparison
feature_7.content: Detect changes in formatting and styles.

feature_8.title: Set metadata
feature_8.content: Keep metadata from either the source or target files or allow it to be specified by users.

feature_9.title: Password protection
feature_9.content: Analyze the encrypted documents, or secure the resulting document with a password.

feature_10.title: Compare specific pages
feature_10.content: Load just the particular sections or pages of the document.

feature_11.title: Display comments
feature_11.content: When loading the source document you can choose whether to hide or show comments.
